abstract.t: This specification defines a mechanism enabling Web sites to declarethemselves accessible only via secure connections, and/or for usersto be able to direct their user agent(s) to interact with given sitesonly over secure connections. This overall policy is referred to asHTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS). The policy is declared by Websites via the Strict-Transport-Security HTTP Response Header Field,and/or by other means, e.g. user agent configuration.
